alert.note: Alert for Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 8:04PM CST until February 26 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WOODS COUNTY... At 804 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Hardtner to 6 miles northwest of Alva, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Woods County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
